Exaggerate: The claim of the Myanmar opposition party chairman forbidding citizens from speaking English is false and has been exaggerated.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a doctored image and the newspaper denies publishing any such report.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the image is a hoax created to attack and ruin the dignity of the opposition party chairman and the newspaper.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is doctored and the newspaper has denied publishing any such report.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times as it is based on false information and misinformation circulating on social media.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the opposition party chairman would forbid citizens from speaking English when there is no evidence to support this assumption.
